attributes.additional_details:
My aim in this short introduction is to lay out why you should sign up.There is no reason why there should be a few wealthy individuals who make no contribution to the wealth of a nation,to paraphrase John Smith.Not content with being billionaires,they want more propert more land and more money.
   They parasitiese on the poor from whom they extract money in return for rubbish.I cite Murdock and Branson as examples.They manipulate the people with expensive adverts and directly target the poor.It cannot be right that they own billions, yet someone has only £1.73   to see them through the week.
            They keep out  the poor and needy from expensive villages and consign them to terrace council estates,not fit for rats to live in.
             I think there is a way of robbing them of their power.Send a message , sign the petition,and put  this anomalie to an end.
